en.emergency_warning: Emergency unlocks should only be used for genuine emergencies. Each use adds a penalty to your next timer.
en.welcome_message: Welcome! We're here to support you on your journey to quit smoking. You're taking a brave and important step for your health.
en.emergency_ai_intro: I understand you're experiencing an urge to smoke. Let's take a moment to talk through this together. Remember, every craving passes - you're stronger than you know.
en.reflection_question_1: What's happening right now that's making you want to smoke?
en.reflection_question_2: How are you feeling emotionally at this moment?
en.reflection_question_3: What could you do instead of smoking right now?
en.reflection_question_4: How will you feel after smoking versus if you resist this urge?
en.reflection_question_5: What's one reason you decided to quit smoking that still matters to you today?
en.encouragement: You're doing great! Every moment you resist is a victory. Your body and mind are getting stronger.
